thread.title: Artist Creates a Full Suit of Black Knight Armor For a 6-Year-Old Made Out of Cardboard
thread.title_full: Artist Creates a Full Suit of Black Knight Armor For a 6-Year-Old Made Out of Cardboard

author: Justin Page
title: Artist Creates a Full Suit of Black Knight Armor For a 6-Year-Old Made Out of Cardboard

organizations.name: my modern met  related laughing squid

text:
In 2011, New York artist Warren King created an incredible full suit of black knight armor for a 6-year-old using cardboard, paint, hot glue, rubber bands, and velcro. Warren shared his entire DIY process on Flickr .








via My Modern Met
